website_summaries.verdict: If you're sick of tangled wires, the Creative WP-350 model is one of the better-sounding Bluetooth wireless headphone sets for the money.
pros: The Creative WP-350 headphones are affordable on-ear Bluetooth headphones with a built-in microphone for making calls and an 8-hour battery life
cons: The on-ear design makes your ears steamy in warm weather, and cell phone call quality is spotty

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but...
customer_reviews.text: I had some problems with the product. It seems that the mixing of headphones with integrated microphone is not good. In my first bluetoth helmet with microphone, so I can't make comparisons, but I have a WP-300 (no microphone) and it works great. In this case I wanted to try this version that includes a microphone. With this, the audio that I receive from the headphones is not fluid when the microphone is activated. Reception is deactivated when the sound source stops for one minute. when the sound source plays again the sound becomes intermittent. I have to deactivate / undock them and reconnect for the connection to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Robaina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for though not bad for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt to get good portable wireless headphones and I found them lacking for my purposes. Though they are fine for usage around the house but without noise cancellation they are not nearly loud enough to be used on a flight. If you want headphones for a flight I strongly recommend spending the extra money to get the Sennheiser MM 450-X (). If you don't intend to use them in flight then get something that is not so portable to increase your options.
customer_reviews.author: Skilla

customer_reviews.title: Hurt your ears if you wear glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give these headphones a better review. If I didn't wear glasses, I would love them. For the price, the sound is fantastic. Unfortunately, even though I have a pretty average hat size (most baseball caps fit with the sizing straps at 1:1) the pressure on my ears with glasses causes pain and discomfort after wearing for about 45 minutes. These were purchased to wear at the office with the hope of all day comfort. While I will be returning this model, I am hoping the over the ear version delivers the same sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: MidnightChef

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, second purchase and I'm filled with regret
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones years ago and they were my dependable gym go to's. When I broke them accidentally I was quick to rebuy. Only to find that a new pair had horrible pairing issues and won't stay connected. Do not buy. Unless you want to constantly get connection failures.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great all around headphones
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of headphones since I spend much of my time listening to podcasts at work, gym, working around the house, etc. I was looking for something that would work in all environments, have good controls, comfortable. These were more important than sound quality to me since I don't listen to music that much. These headphones meet my criteria very well. Great battery life, comfortable, very easy to use controls (not so with many headphones). It stays on my head doing cardio or weightlifting, good for hikes too. Hell, I have them on now. Downer: the voice feature is mediocre. People on the other end have a hard time hearing me so this is emergency use only.
customer_reviews.author: Rtd

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Heard
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to spend hundreds of dollars for any headphone, bluetooth or not. However, I have been looking for a great set of bluetooth headphones that don't break the bank and these are them! These would be incredible at any price, but for around $60 they are amazing. The clarity of sound and bass are fantastic, the range is the best I have experienced, and setup is a breeze. They are also amazingly comfortable. I already own the Jabra (comfortable, sound OK, range is terrible), and the Go-groove air band (these are very good and range is good), but the WP-350 are the absolute best in every area. Highly recommended ! (in fact, I'm buying another set).
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use during class and just if I'm on the move. I really like that it's bluetooth, it's makes things more simple. They have nice bass for the price. The overall sound quality is also nice. But they one things I don't like is that they are uncomfortable. I which the ear cups went around my ears, but they sit on them. And i can't listen for more than 20 minutes without having to take them off. They may be more comfortable for different people, so I would definitely recommend these headphones to any one you wants bluetooth headphones and is on someone tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't sound like a $300.00 headphone but is very good and has a lot of controls. I didn't use it for phone calls and I believe it is not as good based on other reviews, probably because the microphone is too far from the mouth. Listening to music I found the WP-350 to be wonderful considering the price. Range is OK, nothing crazy. Another strong point is the build quality, looks much more expensive than it is and you can control everything with nice large buttons. Overall, 7/10 but for the price I will give 9/10.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Decent bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these is better than I expected. Nothing amazing, but very passable for watching movies and casually listening to music. Unfortunately my android Nexus tablets don't play well with them when streaming over the network, as the bluetooth and wireless on most devices shares a chip. This means that if you're streaming something over the network and listening via bluetooth, you can get choppy video playback or out-of-sync audio and video. Because using these with my tablets for streaming was my #1 use case, I had to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset to listen to music and play video games at night without bothering my neighbors. The headset connects to my phone, but did not connect to my bluetooth 2.1 adapter on my computer. I contacted Creative about this, their response was that since I was not using their brand of bluetooth adapter they would not provide any assistance. I eventually was able to connect it to my computer with a bluetooth 4.0 adapter bought from Amazon. On both my phone and on the computer, the sound came through clear on the high notes but virtually no bass. This headset is not worth the price for the function it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Weak compared to Fatal1ty
customer_reviews.text: I got several Bluetooth device now including the Creative Inspire S2 Bluetooth Wireless Multimedia Speaker System. What a mouthfull. I use the Inspire dongle to connect to it. Otherwise I'd have to buy one separately. Maybe it is just Windows 7 but it is hard to switch between two bluetooth devices. You have to hold button to have it sync everytime. With the Android it is so much easier. Just go to the menu and choose. Having used Fatal1ty head phone the head phones seem weak. Also with prolonged use, you feel the area around your ear get warm. Even if the headset it self is cool to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: MrPerlishells

customer_reviews.title: This is a steal
customer_reviews.text: Great Bluetooth headphone. Material is good; is light weight. The bluetooth connection is a easy to pair. I walked all over my big apartment and I can listen to my music anywhere.The sound is great...breathtaking. It has good bass and the mids and highs sound crystal clear. For $59.99 is a steal! !00% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamRafael

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I dont get the point of the $200-$300 wired headphones. I had my doubts about these, but they ended up being the best headphones I have ever owned. Pros: well, the list would be too long. They sound great, they fit great, they are inexpensive, and they are bluetooth... so they are awesome. Cons: I wish the headphones used AAA batteries, because I forget too charge them, and then they have to charge before I can use them wirelessly. You can use the wired during charging. They do last for ~8 hours/charge. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Bell

customer_reviews.title: Weird Design Choice
customer_reviews.text: I can't provide a really comprehensive review because I simply won't use these. I probably should have returned them, but I failed to do so, so here we are. I don't know what the deal is with the cup design, but they feel absolutely backwards to me - as though the assembly crew switched the left and right sides. When you place the cups on your ears to fit, the strap over your head comes way forward. It's a weird design choice. Apart from that, they seemed to function okay for the few minutes I used them. They're small and lightweight, and seem like they would probably be comfortable for extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sajdowitz

customer_reviews.title: Good set of cordless headphones
customer_reviews.text: As cordless headphones go, I would give these a top notch thumbs up. I am very picky of sound quality so on sound quality I would have to say close to 3 stars, not bad but not excellent either. You have to realize something that if you want to get rid of the cord, you are going to sacrifice something and that something is sound quality. I have listened to these for hours on end and the comfort is also a 3 out of 5 stars. The microphone works well aslo. If you are looking for a pair of cordless headphones I will have to say you can't go wrong, especially if these are your first pair of cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset
customer_reviews.text: This headset is just the ticket for a much better than 'ear-bud' experience. I purchased them to go with my new Microsoft Surface tablet. They arrived when promised using Amazon Prime. They were easy to charge and the intuitive controls are well placed. It synced with my tablet via Bluetooth quickly and seamlessly. The first thing I did was watch a movie and the sound was very good. I did have to read the book to figure out how to turn them off. It is a timing thing, there is one button for several actions; on, off, BT sync, and answer phone. Once you learn how long to hold the button it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo46

customer_reviews.title: Quailty
customer_reviews.text: I won a Creative BT Speaker at the CES conference a few years back. (D100). I was so impressed with the quality of sound I bought 5 for friends and family. I take it everywhere, boat trips, camping etc. I've since compared it to other BT speakers that cost an insane amount more than Creative for LESS quality. Well, I am here now listening to my WP350. Not one person has not been impressed by the sound. I also own a pair of Bose headphones that were given to me. How upsetting. I hope Creative thrives so I can continue to buy their products. Rock on!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to operate, light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to operate, light as a feather, we use them for TV along with a (somewhat substandard) bluetooth transmitter. The sound is not outstanding, but great for TV. Easy to operate. Battery lasts a reasonable time and has the microUSB so it will share other devices cables. One caveat; they occasionally pick up some interference from other devices in the house and cut in and out sometimes. Wifi? Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: GeoMac

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted.
customer_reviews.text: It wirelessly plays my music. Range is longer than I expected--I can go a room or two away and the signal is still crisp through walls. If I leave the range of the Bluetooth, I can come back and my music is restored. Sound is nice and clear, comparable to the sound coming from my computer, if not better. The only thing that bothers me is using it with Skype--sometimes the sound will cut out, making it useless. Haven't tried using it with my phone, but I wouldn't ever need it for that reason I don't think.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Samoy

customer_reviews.title: Good enough headset for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For me, this product loss one star because of the low battery warning. The device dies like within 3 seconds after the warning. My previous blue tooth headset which was the Nokia bh-503 have me about an additional 25 minutes before it dies. This was like a technological culture shock. Also I have to charge the device daily (sometimes lasts 2 days) , while the previous device I got up to 4 days between charges. The headset gives your tunes extra bass and top end. I love bass so I don't mind that. It's comforting to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rickardo Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have met and exceeded my expectations, considering the purchase price. I use them with my Galaxy 3 cell, listening to music while doing chores or playing guitar, trying to learn a song. So far, no issues. A breeze to set up, with better than average sound, I've enjoyed them right out of the box. Battery life is good, but not much warning when charging is needed. Would be nice to have a removable battery and having a spare. As far as I know, that doesn't exist, yet, in headphones. Overall, a great purchase, which I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bbarc

customer_reviews.title: Blue tooth head set
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought, great product and nice quality. Pros - good feel , decent for listening daily music or watching videos on tablet, not to deal with wires Paring is easy first time, folds flats, nice battery life Cons - leaks loud music, not comfortable for extended period of time, unpair is not properly documented. I would recommend for the price. Great pair, I would buy another pair if I need one
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir

customer_reviews.title: Good Head Phones.
customer_reviews.text: I really like them they sound clear and work with the Galaxy S3 swiftly and easily. A few things I would fix would be with design, if they were collapsable they would be easier to carry around on a regular. For someone who was looking to a bluetooth alt. to the Beats By Dre I would like better for a over the ear not on the ear. At the end of the day the Creative WP-350 are very useful and nice to have I would like them to be a little bit bigger but I knew this about them from other reviews. For the price they are defiantly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Perfect crystal clear sound,soft,not disturbing bass, good connection phone/talking. Negative: after 3/4 hour i have got it, the ear pads hurting your ears extremely and the volume is very, but very low and that's to bad for a headphone with his superb sound quality. recommendation=> if you want a BT headphone with a power that will shake you body complete, and a power bass like no other? "BLUEDIO r+8",i have different headphones with /whiteout BT, but this is the TOP!!!!! For a few $ more? don't think twice!
customer_reviews.author: didier van de vyver

customer_reviews.title: Backups for WP 300
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for back up for the 2 Creative WP 300 that we like very much. The price was so good we went ahead and got them now figuring that when we really needed them we would not find them at this price or at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful After Extended Use
customer_reviews.text: Marketed as "over the ear" headphones, these rest directly on my ear and become very painful to wear for extended periods of time (like at work). These should be changed to "on ear". Pros: Excellent battery life, convenient controls, good signal distance Major Con: Very painful after extended use. I have had these headphones for more than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Bravo
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday and I'm extremely pleased. It paired with my iphone easily and the sound quality is off the charts. The mic works great also. I called my wife and she had no clue that I was using an external mic. I will be using these for PS3 gaming also. Comfort is amazing, best I've ever felt. My wife also said they fit her perfectly. I used these all night and they just recharged in 20 minutes via my pc usb. USB mini plug on headset(includes cable)- BRAVO Creative Labs!
customer_reviews.author: 1HonestMan

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: With my limited use of this headset, I found the speakers to be really good but mic could be better. The speakers are over the ears, do not surround those yet soft and don't hurt the ears. Bluetooth pairing with iPhone, iPad and Acer iConia tablet were easy. One thing that I feel it really lack is the using the headset with wire and without bluetooth. I think it is only normal if your laptop does not have bluetooth, you should be able to connect your headphone using a wire.
customer_reviews.author: SONIK

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, but...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving four stars because the audio did cut out when I went to another room with a wall between the tablet and the headphones. However, I got these so I could listen to music while cleaning house etc and didn't want any cords in the way and these deliver! The sound is nice and clean. The headphones are light and easy to use. I guess for more money they would do better through walls, but for the price, I'm a satisfied user!
customer_reviews.author: booshmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great. connects quickly and easily to TV. Just need to get used to the buttons. I ordered these for my mom who is hard of hearing. She has problems with the buttons but once she memorizes where they are it should not be a problem. Headphones are light weight, comfortable, good sound. And she can hear the TV.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: No, they're not $300 studio monitors but let's face it boys and girls, if you're paying that much for earphones just because they're endorsed by some hip-hop artist you've got more money than you know what to do with. These paired up with my Kyocera hydro edge in seconds, I set up a specific equalizer preset for them and for phone calls, they sound way better than the phone itself. Very pleased with this purchase. . .
customer_reviews.author: arlee51

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect and sound great
customer_reviews.text: I am a sound and recording engineer and think these sound great. My wife is brutal on breaking headphones with her laptop. So I decided to go wireless. These paired easily and sound great. I can hear the deep basses that I like to hear and the voices and upper register is clear. A great buy and great gift. I also provided the Azio USB Micro Bluetooth adapter for. Win 7 64 bit OS laptop. Everything worked great. Successful presents!
customer_reviews.author: OmegAudio

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price! Sturdy construction. Bluetooth pairs fairly easily. Sound quality when used to talk on the phone is good. The packaging was a pain to remove! If you wear it for more than 20 minutes it pushes on my ears and makes it hurt (maybe I just have big ears). I've used it for about a month. I wouldn't buy it again just because of the pressure/fit on the ears. I'm looking to buy the Bose AE2w headphones.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality.  Last an entire day at work.
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, I was pleasantly surprised with the sound quality of these headphones considering the price. I used them for over 9 hours, on and off, the first day on their initial charge with no problems. These actually sound better than my first set of Bose headphones that cost 4X as much. Only downside would be that the part that touches my ear is smaller than I'm used to, but they're not uncomfortable to wear for extended periods of time. I would definitely buy another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Theman

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this Bluetooth headset to be better than my Plantronic 995 with 2.4 GHz, since the Bluetooth is the newer technology. I was wrong. My Plantronic 995 sounds many times better, especially when watching a movie. I'm not saying WP-350 is bad, its just okay, its just barely good enough to listen to music during my gym session. I'm not an audio geek, so I cannot say what's missing from this headphone, whether its the mid/low high or bass, I don't know. I just know that its lower sound quality than my other headphones. I've tried to use it with apt-x devices, windows, ipad, xperia phone, its all the same. Something is missing in audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morevin

customer_reviews.title: shame the drives reproduce nice frequencies.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is there but loose fit ...too small pads. shame the drives reproduce nice frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite headphones ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, stellar battery life, comfortable design. Pairs instantly when I power them on. Controls are easy to use by feel. I've got some nice Sony MDR's for deejaying, but for listening to music, I prefer these and use them daily. Supposedly they support the new bluetooth audio protocol that will allow even higher streaming fidelity, if your media source supports it. Can't imagine how they're sound better, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: not great not bad so I guess good
customer_reviews.text: these are a great value for what they are as wireless headphones; however, the mic was not very effective. living in nyc it is never silent with sirens, cars, people, construction, your AC or you're radiator this city is always humming. when talking on the phone the person on the other end was never really able to constantly fallow. it was unusable on the streets and delicate in the apt. I was happy I owned them until my dog ate them. I will wait till better technology comes out before purchasing a pair of wireless headphones with intended use of being able to make phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: kv

customer_reviews.title: I use these daily.
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work every day. Very good music and sound quality. Everyone at my work wants a pair. Once in a while it has a problem with the bluetooth, not enough to not purchase it though. The battery life is perfect. I wish the phone call voice quality was a little better but I mostly use these for music so it doesn't matter much. Why does the wind affect bluetooth radio signal? Makes no sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely better than my previous bluetooth headphone set. Not great but good. I'm not a big fan of the over-the-ear design, but they're light, good quality construction, and battery life about 6 to 8 hours (don't think I actually made a full 8, 6 is probably a better number). Again, not great but good. Sound is not muffled, but just can't compete with a good wired headset.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Newton

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these
customer_reviews.text: I own many headphones I wanted to try these because they were compact and I heard lots of good things one YouTube. I love eese they are so clear and light weight. For Bluetooth they are amazing. I do notice the deep missing a little n it struggled with some songs but it's ok and highs are in point. They are low key on your head and one of the best
customer_reviews.author: G M

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but one problem
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for the price. They need an on/off switch. The manufacturer designed these with too many functions on one button (on/off/redial/hold). If the headphones are paired with the phone, and you try to turn the headphones off, you just keep redialing the last number you called. You pretty much have to turn the phone off first before trying to turn the headphones off. That is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: hannalyn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Use it with my IPhone4S with absolutely no difficulty. Setup with effortless. Range exceeds expectations. The reason for buying these was to use at the gym and they have worked great for that. Just like other reviewers have mentioned, the ear pads get a little bit sweaty, but I'm quite willing to put up with that small inconvenience. Sound quality is good, not great, but just what I need for biking and gym. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John W. Cannaday

customer_reviews.title: Small, light, versatile and great quality... sweet.
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before getting these bluetooth headphones. I did not own bluetooth headphones before so I can only compare them to a wide variety regular headphones and ear-buds that I used in the past. As far as ease of use and convenience goes, these are awesome. Super simple to connect and operate. Also, the design is very well thought out. The charge lasts for a LONG time and only takes an hour to charge back up. The quality of sound is excellent. These headphones are a bit smaller than they look though. They fit exactly ON my ears, not over them.
customer_reviews.author: Oto Hlincik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about 4 months and I really like them. However, about 3-4 times, it refused to turn on for a few hours to a whole day. I think maybe a little rain got inside, although that should have caused it to immediately shut down. Instead, this problem happened when I got home and turned it off (and then it didn't turn on again until hours later). This wasn't a big issue for me but it maybe for some.
customer_reviews.author: Motiur

customer_reviews.title: Bass is excellent, little awkward sitting on the ear
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the bass output. Wished the ear cups went around the ear. Still checking longevity with use at the gym with sweat. So far they are holding up
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable on my head and ears, charge quickly (usually no more than an hour), and the Bluetooth connects quickly and easily. I use them on my iPad, iMac, and Chromebook, usually to watch movies or tv shows on Netflix or Hulu or Amazon Prime. They were very affordable, too. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I would like them to be able to get a tad louder since they do not completely cup the ears and some sound gets "lost."
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: The Best, Compare to BOSE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best. I bought these..almost a year ago. Syncs with any blutooth device. I was comparing them to Bose (which has a little more bass) but this is loud, crisp, clear audio that has never failed. I even walked away from my tabled listening to my show walking across my house and the sound was still clear. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dal V

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN BEATS!! :D
customer_reviews.text: like the title said, BETTER THAN BEATS!! :D great sound! great fit i like that they are light weight and small. durability is very great for 65 bucks. :D this is a great wiresless headphones for the price. i really like them. u will be too. just get these you know you want too.
customer_reviews.author: LMAOGUY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to purchase bulky noise canceling head phone for a few reasons: 1. I didn't want to be completely shut out from the world when I'm wearing my headphones. 2. The bulkiness of most noise canceling headphones are too much for me. These are perfect in the sense they are nice and small and compact. I love not having a cord swinging around when I'm wearing them. Sound quality and battery life are great and when it is time to charge them it only takes about 30 minutes for a full charge. The bluetooth range is not all that great but I usually just have my phone on me anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Item for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for connecting to an Android for listening enjoyment at the gym. They connected very easy to the Android and if I turn the headphones on at the same time as the Android they pair up nicely. The volume, FF, RW, and Play/Pause work great with the Bluetooth as well. Giving it one less star because it needs just a touch more base but still for the price it is very nice. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter  Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love this headphone
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable for me than "in ear" style and very light weight. I listen to music and also audio books. While these would not be perfect for the audiophile, I think they are great and meet all of my needs. The bluetooth is convenient and easy to use. My only suggestion is that I wish they had included AC connecter to charge rather than just USB. Could not charge with my iPad while traveling but solved the problem with a $10 1.5v plug that works great. The iPad plug is about 2-2.5v and would have been too much.
customer_reviews.author: Selective buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound and Compact
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I bought this. Lost it after a year and bought again. Best combination of sound, Bluetooth connection and size.
customer_reviews.author: akay101

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I use these fairly often. It was easy to pair and connects automatically when I turn it on. Headphones are pretty comfortable. They do tend to slide off your head sometimes when bending over. I'm not one to usually complain about audio quality since I'm not really picky when it comes to that. However, I much say that these headphones sound very "tinny". I don't really like the way they sound. I can't comment on how well they work during a phone call because I haven't tried that yet. Overall, these are decent but I don't think I'd buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for over a month now, and I'm completely satisfied with my purchase. I use them exclusively at work in a cubicle in a large building. They are comfortable, easy to connect to my laptop, and have a very impressive range of coverage. I would recommend them to anyone I know. Very happy with the speed of shipping and the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: E.Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about one month now and i have to say for the price it works really well. I have this Creative WP-350 wireless bluetooth headphone connected to a samsung galaxy tab 3 and the range is good. i can leave my tablet in the basement of my home and walk up to the 2nd floor and still clearly hear the good quality sound on this headphone. I would definitely recommend this headphone to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Massive Distortion
customer_reviews.text: Nice low-volume speakers, but even at low levels, sometimes they still distort. Can figure out how to get them to play clearly. Also, don't believe the advertising lie about "crystal clear voice transmission" or something like that. (Can't remember what line sold me on their wondrous versatility.) When used as a Bluetooth headset for your cellphone, no one can understand a word you say; and I'm a professional narrator - so I know how to enunciate. I guess you have to spend more than one or two hundred to get a good set of wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy them over my beats
customer_reviews.text: By far the best headphones for the money I'm here to buy another pair. Decent bass for small Bluetooth headphones. Granted they don't have the sound of beats however. They are not 299.00 I own a pair of beats also but they make my ears too warm.
customer_reviews.author: MeiGuoRen

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad for a pair of $30 headphones. Purchased from Amazon Warehouse deals, fast delivery, accessories included. Very comfortable, easy to use on ear control buttons, nice sound quality. I'm not impressed with competitors that cost hundreds of dollars more. I just want to enjoy my music and videos while at sitting at my desk at work or doing chores around my home. Decent bass and clear highs. I highly recommend :-)
customer_reviews.author: Felisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but small for my ears
customer_reviews.text: Functional, but small for my ears. I have to set the ear cups forward to keep them from causing pain after about fifteen minutes. Also, will only connect to my phone (an older Samsung slider) as a phone headset. The phone won't play music through them. Works fine with my Nexus 7, though, which was what I primarily bought this for.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Took a little getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality us good, however I do not have great hearing and cannot tell the difference between 20 dollar headphones and 500 dollar ones. I can say that I have very little trouble using these with my Android phone, the controls are easy to understand and I like them for listening to podcasts. The only complaint I have is that my ears were a little sore the first few days I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Social Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: These perform very well, I'm using them mainly with my Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 so I don't have a headphone cord to deal with. I would have given them 5 stars, but they have a very slight background noise. But the noise is very low and not noticeable when listening to music or watching movies, and I am very picky. The overall sound is excellent, good bass extension. I would rank them with my Bose wired headphones for sound.
customer_reviews.author: gflash

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile, but I think these sound great. Bluetooth generally works well but learning how it integrates with your phone takes a while because there are so few buttons (I made a couple accidental butt dials early-on). I couldn't get them to pair with Windows 7 laptop even though my laptop pairs with other devices successfully. Subsequent driver updates did not fix it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lareau

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace my old Creative Labs headphones which I broke. Pare easily and great sound. The size is just right, not too bulky but cover the entire ear.
customer_reviews.author: JackG

customer_reviews.title: Steal of a deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought these head phones a year ago. Been the best purchase for my Archos Tablet. Crystal clear sound all around even levels. Fit well buttons on the head phones very responsive. ONly draw back can't use them to talk on the phone but oh well i used them on my tablet when i work out. I am a personal trainer so i stay in the gym and they are great. don't sleep on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rowhan E. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset around for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these headphones at 5 star. Sure its not a Bose, or Beats, but the price is $60 vs $300. The sound is amazingly clear. Although not noise cancelling they are pretty darn close. This is well worth the money. I already own two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: They don't fit my head.
customer_reviews.text: My big gripe with these headphones is that they don't fit my head. They lack a swivel that would allow them to any size head. Instead, if you're head is too big or too small, you're sol, lol! It's too bad, because other than that they look like pretty nice headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lambert

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: The best pair of headset I have had in a long time. The ability to answer the phone too. You wont believed how comfy this are and the sound is unbelievable. My kids keep asking me for them instead of theirs BEATS. Plenty control of your IPhone or IPod touch or any other smartphone. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: primerjob

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Creative wireless headphones I've bought. The first pair got eaten by over-zealous St. Bernards. Nothing particularly bad to say about them. On me, they are more comfortable on "backwards" - L/R reversed. Kind of hard for a side-sleeper to wear these in bed, but I can usually manage :) Otherwise, they charge up fast, hold a charge for several hours. Sound is great, but I'm no audiophile. Range on them is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F

customer_reviews.title: Headphone review
customer_reviews.text: They are very good sound quality and they hold a charge all night I would say at least 8 hours I will actually check and re submit worth the money in my opinion the only thing is sometimes if you start your video before you turn on the headphones you have to restart the video or hold the on button on the headphones about 1 second after the green light comes on for them to connect properly.I can not say why but about 10 minutes after I wrote this review the headphones will no longer connect to my computer. This is about 30 days from receiving them
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is they can feel constricting on my ears
customer_reviews.text: Overall well made. I have occasional issues syncing to my computer that are usually resolved by resetting my bluetooth on the computer end. Sound quality is great. Helps to block outside noises also. Only issue is the cup of the ear piece sits right on my ear and sometimes after 2 or 3 hours of use, they can cause some ear pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cracgor

customer_reviews.title: too small, expensive, and loose
customer_reviews.text: headset is way too small for the average head and the quality is not worth the price, I much prefer the Kinivo BTH240, these are a bit small as well but half the price, they won't fall off your head and they are more comfortable in my opinion. I wear them at work every day
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: This are some very nice headphones. They sound great have pretty good bass in them. They do get uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time. For the price they should come with the bluetooth to USB adapter tho. They can hook up to your I phone without anything extra and sound really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Raserei777

customer_reviews.title: the best for less
customer_reviews.text: This headphones were a gift for my wife and she totally loves it, there is another model that inludes a usb bluetooth dongle. But one problem the battery died almost 3 years and now that the battery is dead, i will need to replace the whole headset. The battery's is not replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - easy connectivity and great sound/battery life!
customer_reviews.text: After churning through 5 other bluetooth headsets with which I can listen to music and manage phone calls, finally found one that works incredibly well. Highly recommend, perfect and easy bluetooth connectivity to computer and phone and great multi-function capabilities for phone calls. Calls are v clear and have gotten positive feedback on voice quality. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound and nice bass, the battery life is also good. They will bother your ears after a while especially if you wear glasses since they sit on your ears. I have noticed that they don't like certain AC adapters when charging so I just use my computer. The Mic works but mine is way to strong and tends to over modulate my voice. I have had these over a year now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cool Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product from Creative. I am a big fan of BT headphones and have tried quite a few since last couple of years. Pros: Excellent audio quality Good Design Cons: Would have been better if it is little lighter and also little cheaper :-) Overall, I am happy with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any problems with these headphones really enjoy using them with my android powered phone. I also have a pair of the new Monster ncredible ntunes by Nick Cannon and these headphones easily match those in sound quality. It goes without saying, but these headphones have the advantage in price and the benefit of being wireless!
customer_reviews.author: Blindmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones with they didn't make me sweat but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones with they didn't make me sweat but I use them all the time on the tractor and in the house.. need to offer pad covers for them
customer_reviews.author: dave65

customer_reviews.title: Super sound!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to listen to music on my IPad 4, and they sound great. The range is about 30 feet, which is consuistent with the 10m claim that the manufacturer makes. I have also used them to make calls with my VoIP system, and this pair of headphones performs well there, too. Overall, I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mean_old_teacher

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wireless headphones. They're fairly compact, lightweight, soft on the ears (so comfortable), and simple to use. Sound quality is good. I have two pairs, one at home and one at work. One note: I never use the microphone so I have no comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Feit

customer_reviews.title: these are awsome
customer_reviews.text: I have a samsung galaxy s3 so i wanted some nice headphones with a mic for music and calls these are awsomeeeeeeeeeee they sound like beats head phones to me but better and cost less they pair easy and are nice and loud if you like loud music buy them now the phone calls sound nice and clear too people tell me the mic is fine
customer_reviews.author: Kali200

customer_reviews.title: They sound great and have good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few years now. They sound great and have good battery life. I think they were a good deal. I've replaced them with inner ear buds just because on ear design is kinda too much for working out.
customer_reviews.author: jtfreelancer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed how good these headphones are. At first I was a bit awry of buying it, thinking it would sound cheap. Boy was I wrong! It was easy to pair with my iPad 4 and MacBook Air. Tip: you may have to increase the volume the first time you use it, it has two little buttons on the side of the right speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sparcus

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is just not there.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wireless headphones and returned them after a week. They sit real weird on your ears like they are made too small. The sound is just not there for me. No bass and all full volume started rattling the little speakers. I bought a pair of bass effects on amazon and were blown away. Check them out on amazon. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding headphones under $100
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best sounding Bluetooth headphones under $100! I like how the ear cups swivel giving some added comfort while wearing since these can start hurting after some time because they are over-the-ear. One feature I like is that I can still use while it's plugged in to recharge. I highly recommend this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed U

customer_reviews.title: Compared to the 250 competitors, these ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why some others are downgrading the sound of these headphones, but I use this with my Samsung S3 phone for my work-outs and the sound is better than the wired headphones that I was using from Sony that cost 40 dollars more. So, if you are looking to put some time in at the gym or on the treadmill/elliptical and don't want the wires, these are the headphones for you. I love the sound, they synched in less than 30 sec., and they ROCK!!! ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Bought Three
customer_reviews.text: The first pair were refurbs that I have been using daily. The second refurbed pair developed a shortage in one of the ear. The third pair were brand new and the ear cup mysteriously cracked within the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Fliptitious

customer_reviews.title: and finally posting a review its a nice unit with very good battery life and even better ...
customer_reviews.text: used this for a very long time , and finally posting a review its a nice unit with very good battery life and even better sound. linked to all my apple and android products with ease
customer_reviews.author: overseer

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. Plenty of bass and volume and pair ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. Plenty of bass and volume and pair with my iphone seamlessly. Have owned them for over a year. I wear them when power walking or at the gym and while I wouldn't keep them on my head for 8 hours, an hour or two is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Great for audio, bad for talking on the phone
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find an older bluetooth headset that I used to own because it was discontinued and this one does the job very well, especially for the price. Do not expect good microphone use out of this unit though, many people have complained it is absolutely awful when I talk to them on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: James Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good for music but not for TV or a live event
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to configure and connect to computer, phone. Sound quality is very good. However there is a delay of ~1 Sec, so if you are watching TV or a Video on computer you will see the delay, lips move first and then you hear the audio which is annoying. I don't know if this delay is inherent feature of Bluetooth Technology.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Dude

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great for listening to music, wonderful for watching movies but not for talking on the phone. you hear all the background noise ever. Its sound like you are speaking in to a CB and you cant understand a word they are saying. So I am dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marquita Collier

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Except for a slightly flat tone, these earphones are great. Very comfortable with easy to use controls. I only use these earphones to listen to music, so I can't evaluate the telephone function. These are the best of several different earbuds and earphones I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: david l. thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, and I've got at least a 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work with a bluetooth transmitter. Great sound, and I've got at least a 30 foot range from the transmitter. The controls are straightforward and easy to use, and I've had no issues with this over months of use. Battery seems to last about 8 hours on a charge, and you can listen while the headphones are plugged in and charging. The cord is long enough for my setup at work, but a longer micro usb charger might be needed, depending on how far away your USB ports are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For price, best Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair that lasted me a year and a half. Probably would have had more time but as a web designer I'm using them at least 8 hours a day...Tried a different brand - got 3 months with them! Some things in life you stick with!
customer_reviews.author: chris binder

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep at work to use with my laptop. So far, they've really exceeded my expectations. Comfortable, painless to setup, and the sound is great (so much better than the earbuds I'd been using). So convenient not having a cord in my way. Only complaint is that sometimes they seem to get "out of sync" and start to stutter and lag. The only way to restore the quality is to pause the music, disconnect, and reconnect the headphones. However, this is as likely to be a problem with my laptop or software as it as with the phones. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This headphone works well and hold a charge for at least eight hours. I really enjoy using at night when everyone else has gone to bed and I can enjoy the sound at any level chosen without bothering anybody else. Should had bought this sooner. Good unit, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones work well.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to complain about these headphones for the price I paid for them. My one regret is that after a few hours of use the ear pieces are very uncomfortable. Also they do not seem very secure when wearing them, this is probably due to the cuffs being the main thing keeping the unit attached to my head (adjusting the height of the arms does not alleviate the problem. Good cheap pair of Bluetooth Headphones for short time use bursts.
customer_reviews.author: d4r3llo5

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is much better than any of my in-ear
customer_reviews.text: I have now owned these for about 3 years. The sound quality is much better than any of my in-ear, stock headphones. The battery life is excellent, and bluetooth range is about 30 feet with an indoor wall in between. All-in-all a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: BobdR

product_meta.title: Creative WP-350 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Invisible Mic
product_meta.description:
The Creative WP-350 with its invisible microphone makes use of advanced noise suppression, speech and audio enhancement digital processing to deliver crystal clear voice calls and outstanding sound reproduction. It allows you to switch seamlessly between a voice call and music playback. Expect CD-quality playback from its meticulously tuned Neodymium drivers. Its apt-X Bluetooth audio technology ensures high-fidelity playback from apt-X enabled devices. Make Creative WP-350 your only wireless mobile companion that allows you to stay in touch or be entertained in high-quality speech and audio performance.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Whether it's chatting on your mobile phone or tuning to music from your tablet, the Creative WP-350 Bluetooth wireless headphones with "invisible mic" handle both with equal aplomb. With the Creative WP-350 wireless headphones, you can move comfortably around in the room, lounge in the patio, or stroll outside, while still listening to your music and taking calls.



Make crystal clear voice calls with the concealed microphone and ClearSpeech Engine technology
Compatible with Bluetooth mobile devices like laptops, mobile phones, or portable media players Featuring the apt-X codec for an enhanced streaming audio experience over Bluetooth, the WP-350 lets you enjoy outstanding CD-quality stereo playback and effortless wireless connection with Bluetooth mobile devices. What's more, superior sonic performance is assured by premium Neodymium drivers that are accurately tuned by acoustics professionals; which makes it ideal for movie and music enjoyment. Regardless where you are, at home or traveling, the WP-350 headphones' lightweight and foldable frame, convenient usage controls on the earcup and ultra-comfortable ear cushions make them a joy to have on your ears, every time. Indulge in the purest audio experience -- without the hassle of cords.

Earcups fold flat for easy storage
apt-X Technology ensures that audio transmitted over Bluetooth is instant and crystal clear PURE WIRELESS, PURE QUALITY WITH APT-X
Wires limiting your listening pleasure? Not anymore. Connect the WP-350 to compatible Bluetooth mobile devices like laptops, mobile phones or portable media players, and experience wireless audio from up to 10 meters anywhere in your home or outdoors.

The WP-350 features apt-X technology that ensures audio content transmitted over Bluetooth is instant and crystal clear. Enjoy high fidelity music and movie playback with superb audio-video synchronization from apt-X enabled devices such as Creative ZiiO tablet, the new Apple Mac mini and iMac.

SUPERIOR SONIC PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT
Precisely tuned Neodymium drivers deliver superb audio for the purest listening experience. Be prepared for total immersion in your music and movie entertainment. Soft leatherette ear cushions let you listen to your entertainment in extreme comfort, even during long hours of extended wear.

CLEAR VOICE CALLS
A concealed microphone lets you enjoy crystal-clear phone calls without a cumbersome boom getting in your way. Also, the WP-350 has ClearSpeech Engine technology that suppresses noise and enhances speech so you won't need to compete with background noise to be heard.

CONTROL AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Instant access to call and playback controls plus volume level buttons make adjustments a breeze.

EASY PORTABILITY
The earcups fold flat for compact storage which lets you fit the WP-350 easily into your bag. Comes with a convenient travel pouch for carrying.

ADD WIRELESS AUDIO TO YOUR COMPUTER
Don't fret even if your computer doesn't have Bluetooth built in. Give it wireless audio streaming capabilities with the Creative BT-D1 Bluetooth USB transmitter (sold separately).

USE WITH YOUR IPAD, IPHONE, OR IPOD
Want to enjoy superior Bluetooth stereo music from your iPad, iPhone, or iPod? Simply plug in the Creative BT-D5 Bluetooth transmitter (sold separately) and transform them into your wireless remote control.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
1 pair of WP-350 headphones, 1 travel pouch, 1 USB charging cable (1m / 3.3ft), 1 year warranty.

WHICH CREATIVE WIRELESS BLUETOOTH HEADSET IS RIGHT FOR YOU?
WP-250 WP-350 WP-450 Driver 13.5mm Neodymium Magnet 34mm Neodymium Magnet 34mm Neodymium Magnet Frequency Response 20Hz ~ 20kHz 18Hz ~ 22kHz 18Hz ~ 22kHz Impedance 32 Ohms 32 Ohms 32 Ohms Wireless Technology Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR (Enhanced Data Rate) Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR (Enhanced Data Rate) Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR (Enhanced Data Rate) Bluetooth Profiles A2DP (Wireless stereo Bluetooth)

feature_bullets: A concealed microphone lets you enjoy crystal-clear phone calls without a cumbersome boom getting in your way
Easily connect via Bluetooth to compatible stereo mobile devices and experience wireless freedom from up to 10 meters
Features apt-X technology that ensures audio content transmitted over Bluetooth is instant and crystal-clear
Precisely tuned Neodymium drivers offer superb audio for your music and movie entertainment while delivering accurate voice calls
Instant access to call and playback controls plus volume level buttons make adjustments a breeze
